column4: Hey guys I just installed ubuntu on my server thats sitting next to me and configures NFS, when i transfer data to it from my other box I only get 300KB/s over a 100mbit network, anyone know why?
anyone know why my transfer over a 100mbit direct connection that im only getting 300KB/s over NFS?
not because you have 100mb/sec conenction with your mode?
